channel.title: imaging on Логотипы logos.com.ru
channel.description: Recent content in imaging on Логотипы logos.com.ru

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Pentax (ペンタックス) Logo Pentax (ペンタックス Pentakkusu) is a brand name used primarily by Japanese multinational imaging and electronics company Ricoh for cameras, sport optics (including binoculars and rifle scopes), and CCTV optics. The brand was also used by Hoya Corporation for medical products & services, TI Asahi for surveying instruments, and Seiko Optical Products for certain optical lenses. Source
You can download the Pentax logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Pentax
item.description: Pentax (ペンタックス Pentakkusu) is a brand name used primarily by Japanese multinational imaging and electronics company Ricoh for cameras, sport optics (including binoculars and rifle scopes), and CCTV optics. The brand was also used by Hoya Corporation for medical products & services, TI Asahi for surveying instruments, and Seiko Optical Products for certain optical lenses. Source
